column1: Purposes for internet usage by individuals (per cent of total population within the corresponding group) by Breakdowns, Purposes and Time period

column2: Purposes
Using e-mail
Making calls (incl. video calls) over the Internet
Using instant messaging, i.e., exchanging messages
Finding information about goods or services
Reading online news sites/ newspapers/ news magazines
Seeking health-related information
Making an appointment with a practitioner
Accessing personal health records online
For other health services via a website or app (e-veseliba, doconline.lv, etc.) instead of having to go to the hospital or visit a doctor
Internet Banking via website or app
Selling of goods or services via a website or app (e.g. eBay, Facebook Marketplace, shpock)
Sharing with self-created content (e.g. video, photos, music, texts etc.) or publishig it
Participating in social networks
Posting opinions on civic or political issues via websites
Taking part in on-line consultations or voting to define civic or political issues
Listening to music
Playing games
Watching video content from sharing services
Watching video on demand from commercial services
Watching video on demand from commercial services
Watching internet-streamed TV
